mapper.select:
SELECT sl.*, su.login_name AS lname, su.user_name AS name, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')as createDate FROM sys_login_log sl LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON sl.login_name = su.id WHERE 1 = 1
and log_name like CONCAT('%','${model.logName}','%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{model.datemin}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{model.datemax}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY create_time DESC
